title.narrative: PRT (R) - Support to the GIVAS Through a Rapid Impact and Vulnerability Analysis Fund (RIVAF)

description.narrative: The Rapid Impact and Vulnerability Analysis Fund (RIVAF) is intended to support research which will produce robust evidence of the impact of the global crisis on the poor and vulnerable in developing countries. It is designed to support the Global Impact and Vulnerability Alert System (GIVAS), established by the Secretary-General of the UN to collate and disseminate information on the social impact of global crises, including the present economic downturn. UN agencies (including the World Bank and IMF) are invited to apply to RIVAF for financing to develop reporting systems which improve real-time monitoring and analysis of the crisis
